pageContext.name: Visit of Oriental Education Institute (新东方坐标) to CommonTown

sections.label: Visit of Oriental Education Institute (新东方坐标) to CT
sections.description: CommonTown is proud to host a visit of a delegation from Oriental Education Institute. OEI is an education center for young technological entrepreneurs initiated by New Oriental, the largest provider of private educational services in China (新东方http://www.neworiental.org). CommonTown shared with the visitors various aspects of the edtech industry in Singapore and the region. Many new friendships were forged and both parties benefited from the intense exchange.
